languages.text: Лорд-капитан узнал{mf||а} конструкцию — подобные были на Райкади Филии, где оскверненный Архиврагом комендант творил с их помощью колдовство.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан узнал{mf||а} конструкцию — подобные были на Райкади Филии, где оскверненный хаосом комендант творил с их помощью колдовство.

languages.text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан узнал{mf||а} конструкцию — подобные были на Райкади Филии, где оскверненный Архиврагом комендант творил с их помощью колдовство.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: similar ones had been used by the Chaos-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia to cast sorcery.
The Lord Captain recognised the structure: similar ones had been used by the Chaos-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia to cast sorcery.
The Lord Captain recognised the structure: similar ones had been used by the Chaos-corrupted commander on Rykadi Philia to cast sorcery.
The Lord Captain recognised the structure: similar ones had been used by the Chaos-corrupted commander on Rykadi Philia to cast sorcery.
The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.
The Lord Captain recognised the structure: similar ones had been used by the Chaos-corrupted commander on Rykadi Philia to cast sorcery.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain erkannte das Gebilde: Ganz ähnliche hatte der vom Erzfeind verdorbene Direktor auf Rykadi Philia eingesetzt, um Magie zu wirken.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain erkannte das Gebilde: Ganz ähnliche hatte der vom Chaos verdorbene Kommandant auf Rykadi Philia eingesetzt, um Magie zu wirken.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} reconnaît la structure semblable à celles qu'utilisait le gardien corrompu par le Grand Ennemi sur Rykadi Philia pour recourir à la sorcellerie.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} reconnaît la structure semblable à celles qu'utilisait le commandant corrompu par le Chaos sur Rykadi Philia pour recourir à la sorcellerie.

languages.text: 舰长大人认出了这件造物。类似的造物曾在莱卡德菲利亚星上出现过，受到混沌大敌腐化的典狱长曾用类似的东西施展过巫术。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人认出了这件造物。类似的造物曾在莱卡德菲利亚星上出现过，受到混沌腐化的指挥官曾用它施展过巫术。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、その構造物に見覚えがあった。ライカディ・フィリアで、渾沌の勢力に堕ちた司令が魔術を使うために、似たようなものを使っていたのだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、その構造物に見覚えがあった。ライカディ・フィリアで、渾沌に堕ちた司令が魔術を使うために、似たようなものを持っていたのだ。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán reconoció la estructura: el alcaide corrompido por el Archienemigo en Rykadi Philia había utilizado otras similares para lanzar sus hechizos.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán reconoció la estructura: el comandante corrompido por el caos de Rykadi Philia había utilizado otras similares para lanzar hechizos.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, yapıyı tanıdı. Rykadi Philia'daki Kaos'un yozlaştırdığı hapishane müdürü, bunun benzerlerini sahirlik yapmakta kullanmıştı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain recognised the structure: the Archenemy-corrupted warden on Rykadi Philia used similar ones to cast sorcery.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, yapıyı tanıdı. Rykadi Philia'daki Kaos'un yozlaştırdığı hapishane müdürü, bunun benzerlerini sahirlik yapmakta kullanmıştı.
